message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $12500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can do $12000, would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?
